title: Bug 7752: Export multiple files with the same filename under different directories to a zip file fails.
OB: When attempting to export multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file, the operation fails with an error message.
EB: We expect that the software should successfully export multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file without any errors or issues.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, please follow these steps:
1. Launch WSWB and create two projects.
2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (such as 'foo.txt').
3. From the main menu, select 'File' > 'Export' and choose 'Zip File' to export.
